author: Oliver JJ Lane, Oliver JJ Lane
title: UK Govt: Please Do Not Go Out to Enjoy the Nice Weather This Weekend
description: The UK is due a "mini-heatwave" this weekend, but the government has reminded people to stay at home, under orders to slow coronavirus.
content:
The United Kingdom is due a “mini-heatwave” this weekend, but the government has anticipated desire to enjoy the weather by reminding people to stay at home under the orders on slowing the spread of coronavirus.
